neighbors.name: Damon Cox & Jannllie Cox
neighbors.claims: Damon B. Cox, 41, and his spouse Jannllie Cox reside on an approximately 8-acre property along County Road 900 South in Cloverdale ([www.menstoppingviolence.org](https://www.menstoppingviolence.org/people/damon-cox/#:~:text=Damon%20Cox%20was%20born%20on,addition%2C%201%20email%20address%20belongs)). No public statements or civic roles involving the Cox family were located in available records as of this writing ([www.giant.fm](https://www.giant.fm/lawrence-county/news/local-news/putnam-county-plan-commission-to-take-up-solar-farm-rezoning/#:~:text=Karin%20Fidler%20is%20one%20resident,idea%20of%20the%20solar%20farm)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Address their concerns about home resale value and views via visual buffers and property value assurances delivered in a neighborly, face-to-face discussion.

neighbors.name: James P. Payne
neighbors.claims: James P. Payne has owned a 3.0-acre residential property in the Cloverdale area since purchasing it in May 2019 ([www.homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/5453-e-county-road-900-s-cloverdale-in/0zftqwwqg0b6d/#:~:text=Date%20Name%20Owned%20For%20Owner,Type)). No record of Payne taking a public position on local development issues was found in news or meeting archives ([www.giant.fm](https://www.giant.fm/putnam-county/news/local-news/putnam-county-plan-commission-votes-down-solar-farm-rezone-request/#:~:text=Lisa%20Zeiner%2C%20Plan%20and%20Building,the%20measure%20and%2025%20supporters)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Newer property owner; not in local leadership

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a community liaison reassure him that measures (like landscaping and noise controls) will protect his property's quiet enjoyment and value.

neighbors.name: Carl D. Grove & Marilyn S. Grove
neighbors.claims: Carl D. Grove and Marilyn S. Grove are long-time landowners in Cloverdale Township, where a 2,000-acre solar farm was proposed in 2023 ([www.giant.fm](https://www.giant.fm/lawrence-county/news/local-news/putnam-county-plan-commission-to-take-up-solar-farm-rezoning/#:~:text=The%20meeting%2C%20which%20is%20slated,ask%20questions%20of%20the%20petitioner)). No evidence could be found of the Grove family speaking at public meetings or holding county offices related to development ([www.giant.fm](https://www.giant.fm/putnam-county/news/local-news/putnam-county-plan-commission-votes-down-solar-farm-rezone-request/#:~:text=Lisa%20Zeiner%2C%20Plan%20and%20Building,the%20measure%20and%2025%20supporters)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Enlist an agricultural extension agent or farm bureau contact to discuss soil conservation and drainage plans that respect their farmland legacy.

overview_summary: None of the three profiled neighbors has a documented public stance on the proposed development (0 support, 0 oppose, 3 unknown). All are private landowners without known official roles, and no high-influence community figures were identified among them.
